thread.title: Mrs lynn tucker
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Mrs lynn tucker

author: Mrs lynn tucker
title: Mrs lynn tucker
text: Our foam mattress developed a defect and Gardner-White helped us out so that our claim would be accepted without a hassle. They sent out their agents quickly and got back to us right away so that we could replace the mattress. Next day delivery so we got it sorted easily. We are thankful for their help with the process.
